name: πTimeSpace
description: πTimeSpace (πts) is an inscription based on the Bitcoin base layer and established in accordance with the BRC20 protocol. πts(πTimeSpace), Leveraging AGI to forge the future of metaverse and digital currency. Explore how to use πts tokens to carry out financial, transaction, payment and other economic activities in πTimeSpace. Through tools and protocols such as BTC L2, side chains, and cross-chains, application scenarios including but not limited to DeFi, NFT, and RWAs will be carried out in the fields of finance, asset management, games, and social networks in the virtual world of the future metaverse.
